briefTitle: Abraxane in Treatment of Metastatic Breast Cancer
officialTitle: Assessment of Abraxane in Metastatic Breast Cancer in a Real-life Setting
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

1. Patients with metastatic breast cancer (according to European Summary of Product characteristics (SmPC)
2. Signed Informed Consent
3. Participants \> 18 Years of Age

Exclusion Criteria:

1. Pregnant or lactating females
2. Neutrophils \<1.5 X 10\^9/L
3. Hypersensivity to nab-paclitaxel
